scripts.sass: mkdirp docs/styles; SOURCE='src/styles/*.sass src/styles/**/*.sass src/styles/*.scss src/styles/**/*.scss' COMMAND='node-sass --indented-syntax true --output-style compressed -o docs/styles src/styles' npm run testfiles
scripts.autoprefixer: SOURCE='docs/styles/*.css' COMMAND='postcss -u autoprefixer -r docs/styles/*.css' npm run testfiles; SOURCE='docs/styles/**/*.css' COMMAND='postcss -u autoprefixer -r docs/styles/**/*.css' npm run testfiles
scripts.cssnano: SOURCE='docs/styles/*.css' COMMAND='postcss -u cssnano -r docs/styles/*.css' npm run testfiles; SOURCE='docs/styles/**/*.css' COMMAND='postcss -u cssnano -r docs/styles/**/*.css' npm run testfiles
scripts.uglify:prep:
mkdirp docs/scripts; cp -f src/scripts/_includes.txt docs/scripts/_includes.txt; test `tail -c 1 docs/scripts/_includes.txt` && echo "
" >> docs/scripts/_includes.txt
scripts.uglify:list: SOURCE='src/scripts/*.js' COMMAND='echo "src/scripts/*.js" >> docs/scripts/_includes.txt' npm run testfiles; SOURCE='src/scripts/**/*.js' COMMAND='echo "src/scripts/**/*.js" >> docs/scripts/_includes.txt' npm run testfiles
scripts.uglify:run: test `cat docs/scripts/_includes.txt | egrep -v "^\s*(#|$)"` && uglifyjs $(cat docs/scripts/_includes.txt | egrep -v "^\s*(#|$)") -m -c -o docs/scripts/app.js || true
scripts.svgmin: mkdirp docs/images; SOURCE='src/images/*.svg src/images/**/*.svg' COMMAND='svgo src/images -r -o docs/images' npm run testfiles
